review: I purchased the Fire TV Stick and I'm very happy with it.  It was easy to set up and I love the small lightweight remote.  I had been using my old Wii to watch Netflix and it was inconvenient to switch from Netflix to Amazon Prime TV.  I almost purchased the Chromecast, but noted that Amazon Prime TV doesn't play well with it and that was the primary purpose I wanted a product.  In the last 2 weeks I've been watching Amazon Prime TV and Netflix to my heart's content.  I know there is much more content available but watching TV is not my full time job.

review: My girlfriend has a hard time sleeping in total silence, so having this attached to our bedroom TV is great for playing anything on Netflix or Prime to help her knock out. I don't have cable TV because there's never anything on TV. I give it 4 stars because using this stick in a different room from my AC router has a lot of hiccups. There is only 1 wall between the router and the stick and it still skips. I have to keep it in the same room.
